summary: Remove a reaction from an announcement
description: Undo a react emoji to an announcement.

request.name: :id
request.comment: REQUIRED String. The ID of the Announcement in the database.

request.name: :name
request.comment: REQUIRED String. Unicode emoji, or the shortcode of a custom emoji.

request.name: Authorization
request.comment: REQUIRED Provide this header with Bearer <user token> to gain authorized access to this API method.
